results.title: Touring Scotland
results.brief_description: Travel to the abbeys, Gretna Green, Ayr, Dumfries and Culzean Castle, Glasgow, Loch Lomond, Man, Ben Nevis, Glenfinnan, Glencoe, fabled islands. Tour the Shrine of Golf, follow the beautiful Mary, Queen of Scots and enjoy the beauty of Scotland.

results.title: Touring Mexico
results.brief_description: Mexico is a clash of climates, cultures and geographical extremes, and civilisations that rose and fell centuries before Columbus discovered America. See Mexico City, Mayan and Aztec civilisations at Chichen-Itza and Teotihuacan; Colonial Guadalajara, Merida, Oaxaca, resorts of Puerto Vallarta, Cancun, Cozumel, Acapulco and Baja.

results.title: Touring Korea
results.brief_description: Blessed with a rich cultural legacy and spectacular beauty, Korea is blending change with tradition. See Seoul, Chejudo, Pusan, Kyongju, Mt Soraksan, Dragon Valley, Panmunjon and Olympic sites.
results.description: Blessed with a rich cultural legacy and spectacular beauty, Korea is blending change with tradition. See Seoul, Chejudo, Pusan, Kyongju, Mt Soraksan, Dragon Valley, Panmunjon and Olympic sites.

results.title: Touring Indonesia
results.brief_description: Indonesia, the land of many islands, is geographically unique. The land area, of almost 2,000,000 square kilometres, is made up of a myriad of islands : Kilimantan; the second largest in the world, Sumatra, Java, Sulawesi, Irian Jaya, the famous Bali and many other islands, some barely the size of a city square, dispersed along the equator, stretching from Sabang to Meranke. Indonesia is an exciting blend of Hindu, Buddhist, Muslim, Chinese and Dutch cultures.

results.title: Touring Holland by bicycle
results.creator_credit: Jerry Musser and Paul de Nooyer
results.brief_description: An experimental film using time lapse and high speed photography, depicting four people cycling through a lounge room with a travelogue projected as a backdrop.

results.title: Touring England
results.brief_description: Tour scenic England, the island in the silver sea that holds a special place for us all. See Royal London, Windsor Castle, Blenheim Palace, Bath, Stratford-on-Avon, Stonehenge, Oxford, Cambridge, York, Cliffs of Dover and Wales.

results.title: Touring Egypt
results.brief_description: Egypt, the cradle of history and culture, traces its beginning to life developed along the banks of the Nile. Visit Cairo, the Nile, Thebes, Luxor, Karnak, Valley of the Kings, Esna, Edfu, Aswan, Abu Simbel, Alexandria, Memphis, Sakkara, Sinai, Red Sea and El Alamein.

results.title: Touring Austria
results.brief_description: With a history of intrigue, romance, opera, festivals, old world grandeur, Austrians blend tradition with culture to live life at its best. Visit Vienna, Salzburg, Innsbruck, Graz, Austrian Alps, Blue Danube and Oberndorf.
